definition[0]: if an emotion, desire, or physical action is uncontrollable, you cannot control it or stop yourself from feeling it or doing it
example[0]: I felt an uncontrollable urge to scream.
definition[1]: someone who is uncontrollable behaves badly and will not obey anyone
example[2]: The presence of some uncontrollable children spoilt the evening.
definition[2]: if a situation is uncontrollable, nothing can be done to control it or stop it getting worse
